name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Dynamic, data-driven developer portfolio built with Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS.
fullDescription: This portfolio website serves as a living, data-driven profile that automatically updates its content from external platforms like GitHub and LinkedIn. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS, the architecture emphasizes modularity and decoupling â€” every project, experience, and metric is fetched dynamically through APIs rather than being hardcoded. The frontend remains lightweight and reactive, adapting to real-time data changes while maintaining consistent visual identity and performance. The site integrates with Vercel for deployment and GitHub for live project synchronization, enabling a hands-free, self-updating showcase of ongoing development work.
features: Dynamic data fetching from GitHub and LinkedIn APIs
Decoupled architecture separating presentation from data sources
Modular React components with clean data pipelines
Real-time project synchronization using GitHub REST APIs
Automated content population for experiences, skills, and repositories
Deployed and continuously integrated via Vercel
